pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package is a minimalist implementation of containers for Linux, making secure containers as easy to create and use as a traditional chroot. It comprises three utilities, contain, inject and pseudo, which use the kernel support for user namespaces merged in Linux 3.8.

use.flag: allow unprivileged users to have multiple UIDs/GIDs in the container (see CVE-2014-8989 for implications)
